html:
For the rest of today, the LowePro Tahoe BP 150. Lightweight Compact Camera Backpack is on sale for only $44.88, down from the regular price of $95.45.

Features include;

  • Holds DSLR, 2 Lenses, & Flash
  • Zippered Front Pocket for 10″ Tablet
  • Thick Interior Padding
  • Interior Pockets and Padded Dividers
  • Discreet Zippered Outer Pocket
  • Tall, Stretch-Mesh Side Pockets
  • Dual-Zipper Openings
  • Quick Grab Handle & Built-In Straps

Purchase the LowePro Tahoe BP 150. Lightweight Compact Camera Backpack for only $44.88
